CustomField.formula:
IF( Quote_Product_Detail__r.Name = 'Hard Costs' || Quote_Product_Detail__r.Name = 'Soft Costs' || Quote_Product_Detail__r.Name = 'Existing Structure' || Quote_Product_Detail__r.Name = 'Delay in Start-Up' || Quote_Product_Detail__r.Name= 'Earthquake' || Quote_Product_Detail__r.Name = 'Flood' || Quote_Product_Detail__r.Name = 'Sewer Back-Up' || Quote_Product_Detail__r.Name = 'Water Damage'
, true , false)
CustomField.label: Include in Doc?
